rating_comment: Good location, clean premises and a room with all amenities that you expect. The owner is easy to reach and helpful. I would recommend this place.

The apartment is in a peaceful and serene location while still close to the ISKCON temple, convenience store and restaurants. The apartment has good facilities and the host is very responsive and accommodating.

Vaasudev’s studio apartment airBnB was perfect. Clean, and fully set up with kitchen (including gas cooktop, sink, and cooking utensils), two ceiling fans, mosquito netting on all doors and windows, and good bathroom facilities (western toilet and proper shower). Drinking water was easily available. Vaasudev was quick to respond to communication, and very friendly and reasonable. The accommodation was easy to find, and it was tidy and beautifully decorated. Perfect for devotees or visitors to Mayapur, with pictures of Prabhupada and Pancha Tattva in the kitchen and a set of Krishna bowls.
Super close (a short walk away) from many cafes and restaurants, as well as the ISKCON campus.
Overall really enjoyed our stay!

Had a great experience. Vaasudev prabhu guided us throughout the trip and was always responsive. Helped with local recommendations. Property was easy to find.
Will definitely visit again. Hare Krishna.

Vaasudevs Airbnb is very near to the temple so easy to walk for darshan at any time.
located at a convenient place to get to other places to eat as well.
Friendly caretaker Ashok.
We had an amazing stay. Host was very helpful and responsive. Will highly recommend.
It is a great place to stay, clean and near the ISKCON temple.

The house is in a quiet place away from hustle and bustle,but located very conveniently and you can easily reach the main places of Mayapur within 15 minutes. The apartment is large,there is a kitchen and hot water, there is no Wi-Fi,but if you bought a local SIM card, this is not a problem if you do not plan to work remotely. Nearby there are shops and everything you need.

Nice n comfortable place to stay. Apartment is well lighted and airy.
4 wheeler roadside parking may be challenging at times as the approach road is narrow. Priced a bit high ( maybe I visited during long weekend rush ).
Caretaker ( for check in / check out ) not available at all times - need to coordinate with local contact provided.

The care taker is not available all the time or lets say whenever you need him. I had issues with the door lock and handle as it broke and called him multiple times after which he turned up and did nothing. Definitely priced very high compared to other options in mayapur. It is close to the temple. Id recommend booking temple accommodation as there are too many options and very close to temple. Btw.. I was given an option to switch the room to a different one after it broke(after 2 hours) but he said that is not neat and needs cleaning which could take another 2 hours.
Check out with the caretaker was not possible after calling multiple times. He then sends someone after my cab waited for 20 minutes.
Room had basic amenities like geyser kitchen equipments, cloth hanger etc.
Overall disappointed !

Best place for long term stay . Within walking area of Iscon complex , this is situated behind the Gita and ishodaya Bhavan building . There are gas cilynder with oven as well as electric kettle with cooking utensils all in the kitchen . For daily needs grocery stores are there nearby, one bakery and one south Indian Resturant’s are there within the complex , you can also walk to gada Bhavan for Maya Prasadam ..
Amazing host. Location was perfect. Just a few minutes walk to the Iskon temple. Place was neat and clean.
Very responsive and polite host. Clean studio apartment. Location is good, 10 minute walk to the temple.
Great location, very close to Mayapur Chandrodaya mandir. Pleasant host and thoughtful host.

I liked that I could cook if I wanted to, as there were so many vessels and LPG cooking gas provided. The person who handed over the keys explained everything to us quite well. The neighbors from upstairs were also friendly and helped when we needed information. Overall we had no issues and were happy with everything provided by our host. Thank you Deepak prabhu!
